snippet: Minnesota Twins pitcher Ervin Santana was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball after testing positive for the performance-enhancing substance stanozolol.
abstract: Major League Baseball suspends Minnesota Twins pitcher Ervin Santana after testing positive for performance-enhancing drug.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Twins pitcher Ervin Santana was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball after testing positive for the performance-enhancing substance stanozolol.
